text.p: What is [mathjaxinline]v+w[/mathjaxinline]? To enter a vector such as [mathjaxinline]\left[\begin{array}{c} 1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array} \right][/mathjaxinline], you can either:

li.p: enter it as you would a [mathjaxinline]3\times 1[/mathjaxinline] matrix: [[1],[2],[3]]
or, you can enter it as <1,2,3>
